org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp

Class TaskFactoryImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.TaskFactoryImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskFactory

    public class TaskFactoryImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskFactory
    A basic implementation of TaskFactory that creates TaskImps, NodeImps and CableImps.
